test.query: SELECT count() FROM zeros(1000000) WHERE NOT ignore(fuzzBits(randomString(10), 0.1))
SELECT count() FROM zeros(100000) WHERE NOT ignore(fuzzBits(randomString(100), 0.5))
SELECT count() FROM zeros(10000) WHERE NOT ignore(fuzzBits(randomFixedString(1000), 0.1))
SELECT count() FROM zeros(1000) WHERE NOT ignore(fuzzBits(randomFixedString(10000), 0.5))
SELECT count() FROM zeros(1000000) WHERE NOT ignore(fuzzBits(randomString(rand() % 10), 0.7))
SELECT count() FROM zeros(100000) WHERE NOT ignore(fuzzBits(randomString(rand() % 100), 0.7))
SELECT count() FROM zeros(10000) WHERE NOT ignore(fuzzBits(randomString(rand() % 1000), 0.7))
